'''1.21.4 Release Candidate 2''' (known as '''1.21.4-rc2''' in the [[launcher]]) is the second [[release candidate]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.4]], released on November 29, 2024,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-4-release-candidate-2|Minecraft 1.21.4 Release Candidate 2|November 29, 2024}}</ref> which fixes a bug.
